duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership for an oncology program within a community hospital and oversee ambulatory clinic patient care.
Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of healthcare professionals to deliver evidence-based, compassionate, and personalized cancer care.
Maintain board certification in Medical Oncology or Hematology/Oncology and obtain state licensure.
Practice in a community-based clinical environment as part of an academic health care system.

education_certification.credential: Board Certified in Medical Oncology or Hematology/Oncology, Must obtain state license, Must be board certified/board eligible in medical oncology/hematology with a desire to practice in a community based clinical environment as part of an academic health care system
